import sys
import math

N = int(input())
moves = 0

for i in range(1,N+1):
    if(i*i >= N):
        moves = i
        break

print(2*moves-2)




n = int(input())
move_count = 0
while n > 1:
    if n % 2 == 0:
        n //= 2
    else:
        n -= 1
    move_count += 1
print(move_count)

import sys
import math

N = int(input())

moves = 1

for i in range(1,N):
    if(i*i == N):
        moves = i*2-1
        break
    elif(i*i > N):
        moves = i*2-2
        break

print(moves)
